title: question about nasus
body:
i was playing {{champion:75}} and  laning  against a {{champion:75}} we did a bro lane and i don't remember exactly how many stacks i had through out the whole game ... but around 15 minutes in i had about 350 or so ... i hit 1k stacks at 40 minutes in and game ended at around 50 minutes in and i had about 1250 stacks ... i had about 8 deaths in the game and helped my team some so i wasn't stacking all game but i tried to stack most of the game ... the other {{champion:75}} had about 150 stacks at 15 minutes ... 380 at 40 minutes and i didn't check how many he had at the end of the game 50 minutes ... anyways my question is ... was my stacks a good or acceptable amount ... i don't think it was horrible but i am not sure maybe mine was meh and the other {{champion:75}}  was just super super super bad at stacking or something i don't know.

anyways thanks for the help i guess.

replies.body: you just made this post to brag, natalieportmanclap.jpg
Your stacks are really good, in fact I'm not even sure it's possible to get 350 stacks by 15 minutes.

if your bro laning its not to hard. we where because 2 {{champion:75}}'s its not hard to get there in stacks. just make sure u get CDR as soon as u can ... i start with a {{item:1027}}  thing then straight to a {{item:3057}}  as soon as i hit 700 gold for that quick damage boost on your q to help u not miss farm and the 10% CDR from the sheen now also helps then ill farm till teleport is back up then get {{item:3067}} because i know i want a {{item:3065}} and because it gives me another 10% CDR and i got 20% from scaling CDR runes ( it helps over time u get up to 10% from that decently  fast because you only need to be level 9 which you get to after not to long and it also helps because you don't have to build another CDR item u just can get the {{item:3078}}  and {{item:3065}}  which you want on {{champion:75}} anyways ) and ill get what i can for {{item:3078}}  with the {{item:3067}} because the first full item i want to finish is the {{item:3078}}

anyways hope this helps at all to see its possible to get 350 stacks by 15 minutes or around there
